entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
